extendedInfo.description: Find more than 12000 doctors & hospitals, book instant appointments on android for free!Searching and booking doctor appointments in India has just got easier! Get the DocSuggest app to find the best doctors, hospitals and medical facilities near you and book instant appointments from the click of a button, all for free!You can search for doctors by specialty, years of experience, area, patient reviews & ratings, insurance and lots more. Join over 8,00,000 users who are already using our services to simplify their healthcare needs.Get the DocSuggest app, to find the best healthcare providers in your area. Key features of the app:* Over 12000+ doctors and hospitals to choose from.* View doctor's schedule and book a doctor's appointment as per your convenience.* View information on doctor's academic/medical background. * Get verified patient reviews.* Minimum waiting time, consult your doctor immediately.* Keep a record of all your past medical bookings* Our services are absolutely free of cost.Why Book Appointment? - Reduce Your Waiting Time: Your doctor is informed in advance of your arrival and reduces waiting time. - Hassle Free Consultation: We are there if you need any assistance in the hospital. - Real Time Assistance: Need route assistance or getting delayed? You can rely on us.NOTE: DocSuggest currently helps you book medical appointments in Hyderabad, Bangalore, Delhi and Mumbai, India. DocSuggest is expanding and if we aren't in your town yet, we'll be there soon!

reviews.comment: Good App n very helpful helpline too. Was useful when most needed it.
